designers.title: Senior UI/UX Designer
designers.about: Passionate UI/UX designer with over 7 years of experience crafting elegant, user-centered digital experiences. I specialize in creating intuitive interfaces that blend aesthetics with functionality, always keeping the end-user in mind.

education.institution: Sir J.J. Institute of Applied Art

experience.description: Lead UI design for enterprise applications, creating design systems and ensuring consistent user experiences across platforms. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver user-centered solutions.
Designed mobile and web interfaces for clients across fintech, healthcare, and e-commerce sectors. Conducted user research and usability testing to validate design decisions.
Created visual assets and interface elements for web applications. Assisted senior designers in wireframing and prototyping.

projects.title: FinWise Banking App
projects.description: A comprehensive mobile banking application designed with focus on accessibility and ease of use. Created an intuitive navigation system and simplified complex financial workflows.

projects.title: HealthTrack Dashboard
projects.description: A patient management dashboard for healthcare professionals. Designed an information-rich interface that prioritizes critical patient data while maintaining visual clarity.

projects.title: EcoShop E-commerce Redesign
projects.description: Complete redesign of an e-commerce platform specializing in eco-friendly products. Focused on improving conversion rates and showcasing product sustainability.

projects.title: TravelBuddy App
projects.description: An AI-powered travel companion app that helps users plan and navigate their trips. Created a visually appealing interface that works seamlessly across different environments and lighting conditions.

testimonials.name: Rajesh Mehta
testimonials.content: Sheetal has an exceptional eye for detail and a deep understanding of user psychology. Her designs not only look beautiful but always serve the core purpose of enhancing usability.

testimonials.name: Priya Desai
testimonials.content: Working with Sheetal was transformative for our products. She brings both creativity and strategic thinking to the table, resulting in designs that truly resonate with users.

testimonials.name: Arjun Nair
testimonials.content: As a developer, I appreciate how Sheetal creates designs that are not only beautiful but also implementable. Her attention to detail and documentation make the development process so much smoother.

designers.title: Product & UI Designer
designers.about: Strategic product designer with a background in industrial design and 8+ years of experience creating meaningful digital products. I bridge business goals with user needs through thoughtful, impactful design solutions.

experience.description: Lead end-to-end product design for SaaS platforms, focusing on enterprise solutions. Established and evolved the company design system. Mentor junior designers and collaborate with product and engineering teams.
Led a team of designers working on fintech products. Established design processes and workflows. Conducted design sprints and workshops to align stakeholders.
Designed digital interfaces for various clients. Worked on responsive web applications and mobile apps across different domains.

projects.title: Enterprise Data Dashboard
projects.description: Redesigned complex data visualization platform for enterprise clients, focusing on information architecture and data presentation. Increased user engagement by 40%.

projects.title: PayEasy Fintech App
projects.description: Created a payment platform targeting small businesses, with a focus on simplifying complex financial workflows. Designed for accessibility and ease of use.

projects.title: InnovateX Design System
projects.description: Established a comprehensive design system for the company's suite of products, ensuring consistency across multiple platforms and enabling faster design iterations.

projects.title: SmartHome Control Interface
projects.description: Designed an intuitive interface for controlling smart home devices, with emphasis on accessibility and clear feedback systems.
